text: The Dunhuang Manichaean texts are a set of three Manichaean manuscripts from the Tang Dynasty that were discovered in the Mogao Caves, a series of Buddhist caves in Dunhuang. * Chinese Manichaean hymn scroll * Incomplete scripture of Manichaeism * Manichaean Compendium * Irk Bitig == References == Category:Pages with unreviewed translations Category:Manichaean texts
title: Dunhuang Manichaean texts
